title: Commas
text: We know that every comma in the the words indicates a comma in the number form. Then, we write the digits between each comma.
speech: We know that every comma in the the words indicates a comma in the number form. Then, we write the digits between each comma.
pacedSpeech: We know that every comma in the the words indicates a comma in the number form. Then, we write the digits between each comma.

title: Rewriting the Number
text: There needs to be three digits in every comma, so this becomes $$11$$ billion, $$921$$ million, $$830$$ thousand, $$106$$.
speech: There needs to be three digits in every comma, so this becomes  11  billion,  921  million,  830  thousand,  106 .
pacedSpeech: There needs to be three digits in every comma, so this becomes   11
